title: Portfolio
shortDesc: This is a portfolio application to showcase my projects, skills, and experience. It is designed to provide a overview of my professional background and achievements.

title: Maze Game
shortDesc: Maze is a game created in Pygame, where the player moves through the maze, trying to reach the goal. The game is based on exploration mechanics.

title: Fish Enthusiasts Social Platform - in progress...
shortDesc: FishApp is a social platform for fishing enthusiasts. Connect with fellow anglers, share your fishing experiences, and get insights on the best fishing spots.

title: Game project - in progress...
shortDesc: Developed with Unreal Engine 5, this project is a isometric game that combines exploration, survival and combat elements. The game is set on a mysterious planet filled with dangerous creatures and challenging environments.

title: MultiLayerNN
shortDesc: This project implements a multilayer neural network (MLP) for classifying handwritten digits using the MNIST dataset. The model is implemented solely with the NumPy library, without using dedicated neural network libraries.

title: Polish Summits Library - backend
shortDesc: Backend application created with ASP.NET Core framework, part of a semester project. The project aims to create a REST API for the Polish Mountain Peaks Library.

title: Train simulator
shortDesc: A train simulator application developed in Java. It is console-based and allows users to simulate train operations, including managing routes, schedules, and train statuses.

title: Pacman Game
shortDesc: Implementation of the Pacman game in Java using Swing library. The game features classic Pacman mechanics, including maze navigation, pellet collection, and ghost avoidance.

title: Polish Summits Library - frontend
shortDesc: A library for managing information about Polish summits.
